content.html: I’m now out of the police station. Still waiting for my colleagues. Make no mistake. There is no longer a right to peaceful protest in the UK. I have been told many times the monarch is there to defend our freedoms. Now our freedoms are under attack in his name.
content.value:
I’m now out of the police station. Still waiting for my colleagues. 

Make no mistake. There is no longer a right to peaceful protest in the UK. 

I have been told many times the monarch is there to defend our freedoms. Now our freedoms are under attack in his name.
